dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, one young apprentice named Eryndor seeks to revive it.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor
dialogues.text: I won't give up! I'll find a way to bring back the magic that once thrived in our land!

dialogues.speaker: Lyra, the wise old mage
dialogues.text: Eryndor, you are indeed brave and determined. But do you truly understand what it takes to wield the ancient arts?
